yaml_config module

class yaml_config.YamlConfig(verbose=1)[source]

Bases: DataManager

Handles loading and saving YAML files.

Extends DataManager:

  • Implements YAML specific file _load_data, _save_data

Inherits DataManager base file handling functionality:

  • load, save, get, set, and undo.

Methods:

Init

Parameters:

verbose (int) – Verbosity level for logging warnings. Defaults to 1.

verbose

Verbosity level for logging and debugging.

Type:

int

_data

Internal data structure being managed and manipulated.

file_path

Path to the file associated with the current data.

Type:

str | None

directory

Directory associated with the current data or file operation.

Type:

str | None

unsaved_changes

Flag to determine whether the data has unsaved modifications.

Type:

bool

snapshots

Stack of snapshots representing the stored states of the _data attribute for undo functionality.

Type:

list

handler

Handler for the specific data type, used for managing data operations and interactions.

Type:

DataHandler

max_snapshots

Maximum number of snapshots to retain within the snapshots stack.

Type:

int

proxy_mapping

Dictionary mapping keys to proxy files for certain data operations or file handling.

Type:

dict

error

String representation of the last error or issue encountered during an operation.

Type:

str
